description:
"Souma has liked making things since he was little, so a friend asked him to design the cover for her self-produced CD. Despite having sent off images of the design to her, not hearing back from her for quite a long time makes his confidence tank. But then she finally gets back to him... 
-- guys who are cool and good looking, but also a bit awkward. These are the day to day adventures of a group of awkward guys who still manage to play it cool."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: クールドジな男子たち
